H

handle(Response) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.util.ClientCommandHandler
This handles the request from the server, the cli and gui treat the requests in a different way, ping requests are treated separately.
handle(Request) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.server.net.CommandHandler
This handles the call from the client, in particular if a client is trying to connect (or reconnect) it puts him into the waitinglist or reconnects him to the game.
handleCancel() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.GUIController
The handleCancel method handles the mouse click event on the cancel button, it refreshes the interface to a state prior to the input selection.
handleCharactersLoading() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.cli.CLIController
This loads all the players and myself.
handleClose() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.GUIController
The handleClose method handle the close event when the close button is clicked.
handleConfirm() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.GUIController
The handleConfirm method handles the mouse click event on the confirm button, it prepares the interface to receive the next input.
handleConnect() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.LoginController
The handleConnect method handle the mouse click event on the connect button.
handleLocalRequest(Request) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.server.net.CommandHandler
A method used to notify the controller, similar to the normal handle, but more stripped
handleM() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.GUIController
The handleM method asks a tile input from the player when the 'm' is clicked.
handleMapLoading() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.cli.CLIController
This method prints the map and the killshot bar, the map is printed using a trick, the maps a saved as text files and the sections where crates and players can spawn are marked to be replaced by the actual content.
handleMapLoading() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.MapController
The handleMapLoading method is used for the loading of a map.
handleMG() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.GUIController
The handleMG method asks a tile input and a card input from the player when the 'ms' button is clicked.
handleMRS() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.GUIController
The handleMRS method asks a tile input, a relaod input, and a shoot weapon input when the 'mrs' button is clicked.
handleMS() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.GUIController
The handleMS method asks a tile input and a shoot weapon input when the 'ms' button is clicked.
handlePass() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.GUIController
The handlePass method directly sends a NOP(no operation) to the server to skip an action.
handlePlayerBoard(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.cli.CLIController
This prints a player board, its a complex part and uses a lot of utf8 special chars
handlePlayerSelected(String, String) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.GUIController
The handlePlayerSelected method is used to add a player target input to a player action.
handlePlayerSelected(String) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.MapController
The handlePlayerSelected method handles the selection of a button from player grid.
handlePowerUp(PowerUp) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.cli.CLIController
This just prints a single powerup
handlePowerUps(List<PowerUp>) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.cli.CLIController
This uses a mechanism to print the powerups in a 2 columns pattern.
handleR() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.GUIController
The handleR method asks a reload input from the player when the 'r' button is clicked.
handleReset() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.GUIController
The handleReset method handles the refreshing of the interface.
handleS() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.GUIController
The handleMG method asks a tile input and a card input from the player when the 's' button is clicked.
handleShootTileSelected(int) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.MapController
The handleShootTileSelected method handles the selection of a button from the shoot tile grid.
handleTileSelected(int) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.gui.MapController
The handleTileSelected method handles the selection of a button from the normal tile grid.
handleWeapon(Weapon) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.cli.CLIController
This just prints a single weapon
handleWeapons(List<Weapon>) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.client.cli.CLIController
This uses a mechanism to print the weapons in a 3 columns pattern.

This condition checks whether the attacker has enough ammo.
